item.title: Tomato Flavored Hamburger and Macaroni
item.description: This is a based, easy and relatively quick to make meal. Great for making in large batches with a big pot and eating throughout the week. ‚è≤Ô∏è Prep time: 15 min üç≥ Cook time: 1 hour üçΩÔ∏è Servings: 6+ Ingredients 1kg Med ground beef 900g Elbow macaroni 4 Cans of tomato soup Diced half or full onion Diced half or full bell pepper Oregano leaves Paprika Basil Sage Savory Thyme Marjoram Rosemary leaves Garlic salt Pink salt Onion power Frank’s RedHot sauce (optional) Mozzarella Cheese (optional) Directions Drop ground beef into large pot on low-medium heat.
